snippet.title: Seiyuu Danshi  18+ English BL/Yaoi/Gay Game: Promotional Video (PV)
snippet.description:
Seiyuu Danshi, 18+ BL/Yaoi game's voiced version is now officially released! 
Previous buyers will be able to update to the voiced build for FREE.

Because the previous voice actors decided to quit from the position, the voice actors have been re-cast privately. Please welcome the new cast!

Haato - CV: Tarou Yamada
Toru - CV: Hayama Kyugo
Shiba - CV: Taichi Tanukida
Shuu - CV: Hikari Kuga
Hikaru - CV: Pekemaru
Toshiyuki - CV: Gungnir

PURCHASE LINK:
seiyuudanshi.meyaoi.com

GAME SPECIFICATION:
- 7 (SEVEN) dateable guys!
- 418,000 wordcount!
- Available for Mac, Windows, Linux!
- Total 100+ UNIQUE CGs and 1,600+ TOTAL images!
- 100+ hours estimated playthrough!

Check out Seiyuu Danshi's site for more CG sneakpeeks and screenshots!
http://seiyuudanshi.meyaoi.com

If you want to see more about Seiyuu Danshi, you can follow us on:
Tumblr
http://meyaoigames.tumblr.com/

Patreon
http://patreon.com/meyaoigames
